title: [LFT]/[LFM] - New Organisation
body:
Hi,

I'm currently in the process of making an eSports team/organisation and I'm looking at getting potential player talent on board for a LoL team.

If you are an existing team looking for someone to manage your team please contact me, or if you're interested in just forming a team you're also more then welcome to drop me a message.

Cheers.
